work.company: Engineers in Action / Bridges to Prosperity - Cochabamba, Bolivia

work.description: Built two pedestrian bridges for isolated communities in Bolivia • Managed design and construction of 83m pedestrian bridge • Re-established EIA and Bridges to Prosperity Chapter at Duke University

work.title: Volunteer Developer & Student Ambassador for Campus Engagement
work.description: Created websites for Duke Children’s Cancer Center and Research fundraising initiative raising $75,000 • Websites: http://www.dukeks4kids.com, http://www.dukebigwaves.com, http://www.dukefence4thefight.com • Bridged the gap between Duke students and the hospital by increasing interaction through volunteer events

work.company: Game Tenting Help Center – Durham, NC
work.title: Construction Manager
work.description: Pioneered a Duke Krzyzewskiville-Ville Scheduling Application used by students to facilitate tenting • Front-end developer of Duke scheduling web app/mobile app for students to facilitate Duke Basketball tenting • Web Framework: JavaScript (+React, Redux), Semantic UI, Ruby on Rails; Website: http://www.gthc.io • App Framework: React Native, Ruby on Rails; Apple App Store: Game Tenting Help Center (GTHC)
